localResource.name: Storage_type
localResource.label: Storage_type
localResource.queryString: SELECT DISTINCT v3_0_enum_translator_view.value, v3_0_enum_translator_view.enum_key, 0 as sort FROM v3_0_enum_translator_view, v3_0_storage_domain_configuration_view, v3_0_datacenter_storage_domain_map_view WHERE v3_0_storage_domain_configuration_view.storage_domain_type = v3_0_enum_translator_view.enum_key AND v3_0_enum_translator_view.enum_type = 'STORAGE_DOMAIN_TYPE' AND v3_0_datacenter_storage_domain_map_view.storage_domain_id = v3_0_storage_domain_configuration_view.storage_domain_id AND v3_0_datacenter_storage_domain_map_view.datacenter_id = cast($P{P_DataCenter_ID} as uuid) AND v3_0_storage_domain_configuration_view.history_id in (SELECT max(a.history_id) FROM v3_0_storage_domain_configuration_view a GROUP BY a.storage_domain_id) AND v3_0_datacenter_storage_domain_map_view.history_id in (SELECT max(b.history_id) FROM v3_0_datacenter_storage_domain_map_view b GROUP BY b.storage_domain_id, b.datacenter_id) AND create_date <= CASE WHEN $P{P_Period} = 'Daily' THEN CAST($P{P_Start_Date} as TIMESTAMP) + interval '1 day' WHEN $P{P_Period} = 'Monthly' THEN CAST($P{P_Start_Date} as TIMESTAMP) + interval '1 month' WHEN $P{P_Period} = 'Quarterly' THEN CAST($P{P_Start_Date} as TIMESTAMP) + interval '3 month' WHEN $P{P_Period} = 'Yearly' THEN CAST($P{P_Start_Date} as TIMESTAMP) + interval '1 year' END AND (delete_date IS NULL OR (delete_date >= CAST($P{P_Start_Date} as TIMESTAMP) AND delete_date <= CASE WHEN $P{P_Period} = 'Daily' THEN CAST($P{P_Start_Date} as TIMESTAMP) + interval '1 day' WHEN $P{P_Period} = 'Monthly' THEN CAST($P{P_Start_Date} as TIMESTAMP) + interval '1 month' WHEN $P{P_Period} = 'Quarterly' THEN CAST($P{P_Start_Date} as TIMESTAMP) + interval '3 month' WHEN $P{P_Period} = 'Yearly' THEN CAST($P{P_Start_Date} as TIMESTAMP) + interval '1 year' END)) AND attach_date <= CASE WHEN $P{P_Period} = 'Daily' THEN CAST($P{P_Start_Date} as TIMESTAMP) + interval '1 day' WHEN $P{P_Period} = 'Monthly' THEN CAST($P{P_Start_Date} as TIMESTAMP) + interval '1 month' WHEN $P{P_Period} = 'Quarterly' THEN CAST($P{P_Start_Date} as TIMESTAMP) + interval '3 month' WHEN $P{P_Period} = 'Yearly' THEN CAST($P{P_Start_Date} as TIMESTAMP) + interval '1 year' END AND (detach_date IS NULL OR (detach_date >= CAST($P{P_Start_Date} as TIMESTAMP) AND detach_date <= CASE WHEN $P{P_Period} = 'Daily' THEN CAST($P{P_Start_Date} as TIMESTAMP) + interval '1 day' WHEN $P{P_Period} = 'Monthly' THEN CAST($P{P_Start_Date} as TIMESTAMP) + interval '1 month' WHEN $P{P_Period} = 'Quarterly' THEN CAST($P{P_Start_Date} as TIMESTAMP) + interval '3 month' WHEN $P{P_Period} = 'Yearly' THEN CAST($P{P_Start_Date} as TIMESTAMP) + interval '1 year' END)) $P!{is_deleted} UNION ALL SELECT DISTINCT value, -1, 1 FROM v3_0_enum_translator_view WHERE enum_type = 'REPORTS_ALL' AND enum_key = 0 ORDER BY sort DESC, value
